The guide can be found in the Setting tab. Please delete any unrelated course by check the course\'s faculty. This process is done automatically. Lowercase letters are acceptable.

This application is based on iCress website. Any information regarding your timetable or course registration is not hosted by Minima developer. You can add your course by press the \"Add course\" button on the top of the screen. You need to fill your \"Course code\" and \"Group name\" based on your course registration slip. Press \"Add\" button to find for the course specified online. It will automatically add if there is course available. Long press on a course to edit the course name or delete the course from your timetable. Press back to cancel the option. You can automatically recheck your timetable for changes on iCress by clicking \"Recheck Timetable Online\". This functionality is replaced by the \"Open Student Portal\" setting. It will open student portal using your Android phone\'s default browser. You can send feedback via email by clicking on the \"Feedback\" option. Press \"Minima vX.X.X\" setting to visit the company website. You can now save table as image by clicking \"Create Table\" setting and click on \"Save as PNG\" button. You can also reset all your timetable data, including courses by click on the \"Reset Timetable\". You can refresh your timetable by clicking the top right icon on the widget. You can also open your timetable directly from widget by clicking on the day display on the widget. This option only natively available for Android 7.1 and above or use any compatible launcher application available in the Play Store. You can long press the application icon to see the two shortcuts available: iCress and simsweb. These shortcuts can be dragged into your home screen. These shortcuts will open iCress or simsweb webpage from your default browser.
